A-Heterogeneous antiviral: A.1 Ligand based Heterogeneous antiviral AI model
A-Phenotypic antiviral: A.2 Ligand based Phenotypic antiviral AI model
A-RNA-dependent-RNA-polymerase: A.3 Ligand based RNA-dependent RNA polymerase AI model
A-Helicase: A.4 Ligand based Helicase AI model
A-3C-like-protease: A.5 Ligand based  3C-like protease AI model
B-RNA-dependent-RNA-polymerase: B.1 Structure based RNA-dependent RNA polymerase AI model
B-Helicase: B.2 Structure based Helicase AI model
B-3C-like-protease: B.3 Structure based 3C-like protease AI model
B-Papain-like: B.4 Structure based Papain-like protease AI model
